text: Harris Kimberley Faulkner (born October 13, 1965) is a conservative American newscaster, and television host for Fox News Channel. Faulkner joined Fox News Channel in 2005. She hosts The Faulkner Focus and Outnumbered. ==References== Category:American Emmy Award winners Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:American television presenters Category:American television news anchors Category:Fox News people Category:Writers from Atlanta
title: Harris Faulkner
